name: Monstralia (DJ Heart Throb)
description:
Project made in association with the Health Start Foundation. Learn to get your body moving by dancing along with your pet monster. Game developed and tested on mobile devices.

Controls:

Click and drag your mouse in the direction seen on the arrow to gain points. The objective is to earn enough points in the level before time runs out. Further levels require more points to complete.

Responsibilities:

Coded mouse/touch controls, compiled assets into playable build, fix bugs found by testers.
